label: AB4CD2_tP16_113_c_f_a_e-001
title: Ammonium Chlorite (NH$_{4}$ClO$_{2}$) Structure
comments:
This is the updated version of \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_tP8_100_b_a_c-001}{the $F5_{4}$ structure}, including the positions of the hydrogen atoms. 
 The data for this structure was taken at 150K. 
 This should not be confused with ammonium chlorate, NH$_{4}$ClO$_{3}$, which takes on the \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC3_hR5_160_a_a_b-002}{$\gamma$-KNO$_{3}$ structure}, or \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC4_cF24_216_a_b_e-001}{NH$_{4}$ClO$_{4}$, which has the $H0_{5}$ structure}.
